```{r}
#load packages
library(terra)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

Read in data
```{r}
#Lake Champlain, Missiqoi Bay, Lake stations
p.champlain <- "./wildcard_thursday/lake_champlain.shp"
p.bb_miss <- "./wildcard_thursday/bb_miss.shp"
p.lake_stations <- "./wildcard_thursday/lake_stations.shp"

#read in shapefiles
champlain <-  sf::read_sf(p.champlain)
bb_miss <-  sf::read_sf(p.bb_miss)
lake_stations <-  sf::read_sf(p.lake_stations)

#check their CRS
champlain %>% sf::st_crs() #NAD83 / Vermont
bb_miss %>% sf::st_crs() #Albers_Conic_Equal_Area
lake_stations %>% sf::st_crs() #"WGS 84

```
